sn22.9:1.4: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitasmim rupasmim anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.6: paccuppannassa rupassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn22.9:1.11: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitesu sankharesu anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.13: paccuppannanam sankharanam nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn22.9:1.16: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako atitasmim vinnanasmim anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.18: paccuppannassa vinnanassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti”ti.
